backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing HTTP outcalls for external IP, ping latency, geo info, and download speed tests with fallback providers and timing logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including components, hooks, styling, and app behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading main.tsx via module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling high-accuracy geolocation tracking, reconnection logic, toasts, trail storage, distance calculation, and UI composition.
frontend/src/components/CoordinateDispla: Displays formatted coordinates, accuracy quality, speed, heading, and total distance with visual indicators for approximate location.
frontend/src/components/DeviceInfoDialog: Dialog showing detailed device, browser, hardware, and network information with collapsible sections and live data updates.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing attribution and link to caffeine.ai with simple styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app icon, title, and subtitle for the GPS tracker UI.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Canvas-based map component handling tile rendering, zooming, panning, auto-follow, and drawing user/trail markers with multiple tile providers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, handling login/logout, and exposing authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks that fetch external IP, network latency, and geo info using the authenticated backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes, radii, and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata storing state, features, issues, and new feature requests for map improvements.
